I don't know if its ok to bring up old posts but I read about the
Takagi family here http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/message/1750

and the "FILES" section go to the folder "Saitou Hajime Info"
Translations and click on the first file it has stuff on the family,
Tokio and her brother.

sorry if it is not allowed to go back this far to reply to a post.

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, shinsengumi3@a... wrote:
> I posted this on LJ and got absolutely no response, much like my
other two

for is

like to hear. 
> Names (I've seen inconsistent information on just Tokio's brother's
name for 
> crying out loud), dates, importance, etc, etc. Please. With sugar on
top. Thank 
> you.
